data.name: AppCommand_Restart
data.value: Please try again.

data.name: AppInfo_Capabilities
data.value: My capabilities are only limited to reading or writing email messages.

data.name: AppInfo_Introduction
data.value: Hi there! I’m Umbrella, your friendly voice-operated email assistant.

data.name: AppQuery_Generic
data.value: How can I help you today?

data.name: DraftInfo_EmailNotSend
data.value: You chose not to send this email. I'll discard the draft and proceed.

data.name: DraftInfo_EmailSummary
data.value: Thank you! Your message to {0}, subject: {1}, reads, {2}

data.name: DraftInfo_Instructions
data.value: I'll guide you through writing and sending your email. Let's get started!

data.name: DraftInfo_Introduction
data.value: Welcome to the email drafting page!

data.name: DraftQuery_Confirmation
data.value: You said: {0}. Is that correct?

data.name: DraftQuery_EmailBody
data.value: Perfect. Now, let's compose the body of your email. Please dictate your message clearly.

data.name: DraftQuery_EmailRecipient
data.value: First, who would you like to send this email to? Please say the recipient's email address.

data.name: DraftQuery_EmailSubject
data.value: Got it. Next, what is the subject of your email? Please state the subject line.

data.name: DraftQuery_SendEmail
data.value: Your email is ready; should I send it now?

data.name: DraftResponse_EmailBody_Reject
data.value: Ok, please dictate the email body text again.

data.name: DraftResponse_EmailRecipient_Invalid
data.value: {0} is an invalid email address, please try again

data.name: DraftResponse_EmailRecipient_Reject
data.value: Ok, please try saying the email address again.

data.name: DraftResponse_EmailSubject_Reject
data.value: Ok, please dictate the subject line again.

data.name: DraftResponse_SendEmail
data.value: Your email message to {0} has been sent!

data.name: DraftResponse_SendEmail_Failed
data.value: Email didn't go through. We're canceling the operation. Feel free to try again later.

data.name: InboxInfo_EmailSummary
data.value: Message {0} is from {1}, subject {2}

data.name: InboxQuery_OpenEmail
data.value: Do you want me to open this email?

data.name: InputReponse_ReadEmails
data.value: Certainly! You currently have {0} new messages.

data.name: InputReponse_WriteEmail
data.value: Got it! Let's head over to the email drafting screen and begin

data.name: InputResponse_Invalid
data.value: Hmm, I didn't quite get that. Could you repeat it for me?

data.name: InputResponse_OpenEmail
data.value: Great! Let's move forward and review the email in detail.

data.name: InputResponse_Undefined
data.value: I'm afraid I can't perform that task at the moment.

data.name: ReadingInfo_EmailSummary
data.value: This message was sent by {0} at {1}

data.name: ReadingInfo_Introduction
data.value: Welcome to the email reading page

data.name: ReadingInfo_Subject
data.value: Email subject line: {0}

data.name: ReadingQuery_ReadEmail
data.value: Should I proceed reading this message?

data.name: ReadingQuery_RepeatDelete
data.value: Do you want to reply or delete this message?

data.name: ReadingQuery_RepeatRead
data.value: Do you want me to read it again?

data.name: ReadingReponse_ReadEmail
data.value: Absolutely, the email reads as follows
